content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'repono_ayanadatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [repono_ayanadatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO
--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Inverter_TABLE2
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Inverter_TABLE2 (
	[Date] datetime2(7),
	[Block] nvarchar(4000),
	[ICR] nvarchar(4000),
	[Inv] nvarchar(4000),
	[InvDCLoad] float,
	[Inverter_OEM] nvarchar(4000),
	[Module_OEM] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModuleWattage] nvarchar(4000),
	[CellTechnology] nvarchar(4000),
	[tagname] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'synapse/workspaces/sapience/warehouse/reassets.db/inverter_table2',
	DATA_SOURCE = [repono_ayanadatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Inverter_TABLE2
GO
